articles.title: Argentina's Puerta 8: the barrio and the deadly cocaine
articles.description: A dozen children stare as if hypnotized at the fire heating a pot of stew.
articles.content: View of Puerta 8, a low income neighborhood north of Buenos Aires, Argentina, Wednesday, Feb. 9, 2022, where contaminated cocaine may have been sold. A batch of that toxic cocaine has killed at least 23 people and hospitalized many more, according to... [4272 chars]

articles.title: Argentina Open: Fabio Fognini Finds Winning Formula in Buenos Aires
articles.description: Fabio Fognini defeated Pedro Martinez 6-4, 7-6(5) to book his place in the quarter-finals of the Argentina Open.
articles.content: Fabio Fognini reached the quarter-finals of a tour-level event for the first time since April, defeating Spain’s Pedro Martinez 6-4, 7-6(5) at the Argentina Open. The fourth seed Italian set the wheels in motion as he out-maneuvered Martinez with his... [2219 chars]

articles.title: GRAINS-Soybeans set for 4th weekly gain on South American crop woes
articles.description: SINGAPORE, Feb 11 (Reuters) - Chicago soybean futures gained ground on Friday and were set for a fourth weekly gain, as a severe drought curbed production in key suppliers Brazil and Argentina and underpinned prices.Wheat dropped for a second session, while corn eased.FUNDAMENTALS* The most-active soybean contract on the Chicago Board of Trade (CBOT) added more that 15% in
articles.content:
SINGAPORE, Feb 11 (Reuters) - Chicago soybean futures gained ground on Friday and were set for a fourth weekly gain, as a severe drought curbed production in key suppliers Brazil and Argentina and underpinned prices.

articles.title: The Best of Bizarrap, Argentina’s Hottest Producer
articles.description: The beatmaker’s BZRP Music Sessions YouTube series has become a viral phenomenon. Here are five of the liveliest episodes.
articles.content: In the last few years, Argentine producer Gonzalo Conde, better known as Bizarrap (pronounced “Bee-shah-rahp”), has bum-rushed the global stage, becoming one of the world’s most thrilling beatmakers. The 23-year-old’s style smashes together EDM’s bra... [5861 chars]

articles.title: New wonderkid on Liverpool radar as agent reveals he is 'waiting for a call' from Jurgen Klopp's side
articles.description: Fulham attacking midfielder Fabio Carvalho is not the only starlet on the radar of Liverpool as they are reportedly targeting Argentina's Facundo Farias.
articles.content:
Fulham starlet Fabio Carvalho is not the only teenager Liverpool want to sign as are they reportedly targeting an Argentine wonderkid.
